name: Fun Rope 3D - Rescue Puzzle
description:
Drag the rope to make a safe path, control all color man in the rope and rescue them.
Do not forget to avoid obstacles along the way. Bomb, lazer, saw, gun,...are dangerous. You are in a rescue game, be careful with these obstacles.
It’s addictive!

If you play Fun Rope 3D, be sure you have nothing to do. You will play it for hours and can’t put it down.
